# `<Images />`

Images defines the images used in Symbol layers.<br/><br/>Use this component to add images to the map style that can be referenced<br/>by symbol layers using the `iconImage` property.

## Props

| Prop                |  Type   | Default | Required | Description                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |
| ------------------- | :-----: | :-----: | :------: | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| `images`            | `shape` | `none`  |  `true`  | Specifies the images in key-value pairs required for the style.<br/>Keys are names used in style expressions (e.g., "customIcon").<br/><br/>Values provide a `source`, which can be one of the following types:<br/>- A string URL: `"https://example.com/icon.png"`<br/>- A native asset name: `"pin"` (from xcassets on iOS or drawable on Android)<br/>- A require/import: `require('./icon.png')`<br/><br/>If your image supports SDF, you can set the `sdf` property to true:<br/>`{ source: require('./sdf-icon.png'), sdf: true }`<br/><br/>@example<br/>`tsx<br/><Images<br/>  images={{<br/>    remote: 'https://example.com/marker.png',<br/>    require: require('./marker.png'),<br/>    native: "marker",<br/>    sdf: { source: require('./sdf-marker.png'), sdf: true },<br/>  }}<br/>/><br/>` |
| `  [object Object]` | `union` | `none`  |  `true`  | FIX ME NO DESCRIPTION                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
| `onImageMissing`    | `func`  | `none`  | `false`  | Called when a layer references an image that is not present in the style.<br/>You can use this to dynamically add images on demand.<br/><br/>@example<br/>`tsx<br/><Images<br/>  images={images}<br/>  onImageMissing={(event) => {<br/>    setImages(prev => ({ ...prev, [event.nativeEvent.image]: fallbackIcon }));<br/>  }}<br/>/><br/>`<br/>_signature:_`(event:NativeSyntheticEvent) => void`                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
